ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "In progress"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Recall") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "In progress"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Submitted") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "In progress"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Approval In Progress") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "In progress"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Approved") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "In progress"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Rejected") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "In progress"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Not yet commenced") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Stage can only be manually updated from 'In progress' to 'Final' or 'Archive'
